project_abstract.cdata: The Seventh Development Finance Companies Project will encourage development of private industry through contribution of foreign exchange for loan and equity financing by Development Finance Companies of investment projects, including technological improvements, and pollution control, in manufacturing, agro-industry, mining and tourism.
